column4: hi i am trying to install subversion and i got stuck on this step, can someone tell me what it means?  Add yourself and www-data (the Apache user) as users to this group
(Note: in order to see www-data you may need to modify root's /apps/gnome-system-tools/users/showall GConf setting
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
